A ranching-related thing I thought up of.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Suggestions for Tecmo: A ranching-related thing I thought up of.
By Jake on Tuesday, December 11, 2007 - 06:11 pm:

You know how In like MR2 you have Colt as your ranch partner? Well, this sounds kind of silly to say, but I think Lisa Shock should be a ranch partner In the next MR game. You know, sort of like how Lisa Shock would be like In the MR world. The reason why I say Lisa should be a Ranch partner in the next MR game is because of how hard she worked on this site, including everybody else. Or one of the tournament names In the games could be called, "The Lisa Shock cup" where you fight against Lisa Shock's favorite monsters. I hope this doesn't count as spam, i was just saying that i think it would be a cool idea.

By lileave on Wednesday, June 11, 2008 - 02:05 am:

I second this motion. Lisa's contributions to the Ranching world and hard work has brought many to the series that wouldn't have otherwise. If anything, she should be given a job with Tecmo since she knows what the largest population of fans wants. She is one herself, afterall.
To add on to your ranch partner idea, they should have the questions actually determine a partner-i.e., having several possibilities. It's quite possible as MRBCepi.II has a series of questions that determines which monster cards you start with.
